titleInfo.title: Bounds for the variation of the roots of a polynomial and the eigenvalues of a matrix

mods.abstract: We derive some new bounds for the distance between the roots of two polynomials in terms of their coefficients and for the distance between the eigenvalues of two matrices in terms of the norm of their difference.
